title: Cathedrals of the Flesh : In Search of the Perfect Bath
description: People journey to Greece for the ruins, Turkey for the Hagia Sophia, and Russia for St. Basil's, but Alexia Blue travels with a different purpose: to visit the public baths. What starts off as a simple vacation quickly becomes an obsession, as Brue ventures out to sample the range of bathing traditions the world has to offer. Full of intimacies, discoveries and unexpected twists, Cathedrals of the Flesh is the candid and playful account of one woman's determination to follow her passion.
author: Alexia Brue
